aggregation: The index is formed by taking the point estimates from a Bayesian factor analysis model of the indicators for print/broadcast censorship effort (v2mecenefm), harassment of journalists (v2meharjrn), media self-censorship (v2meslfcen), freedom of discussion for men/women(v2cldiscm, v2cldiscw) and freedom of academic and cultural expression (v2clacfree).
name: v2x_freexp
